title: Don't remember how to make a clan tag......
body:
I've clicked everything, right-clicked the clans in the friends bar, right-click everything. Nothing's working

It's been a while since I made one, so I don't remember how to create one. Could anyone help?

replies.body: Clan tag creation is currently disabled according to the support section of the website.
Damn. Thanks for letting me know though.
pretty sure you can do that by clicking the group button then right click your club for the option to set the club tag
I do, but all it gives me is the option to Leave Club
Do you have at least 5 people in the club? That's probably the only reason I can think of it wouldn't be immediately available. Good luck :)
I have 6, but I just can't remember where to go to create the clan tag
Sorry then :( I've never created a club myself so I don't know.
